document_data.name: Maklin Mucklar
document_data.mainbody: '''Maklin Mucklar''' was a [[gnome]] [[alchemist]] in [[Waterdeep]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Maklin sold his alchemical products inside the [[Yawning Portal]] inn with the permission of [[Durnan]].
document_data.History: In 1479 DR, a male human arrived at the Yawning Portal accusing Maklin of selling to him years ago in [[Baldur's Gate]] a poisoned healing potion that caused the death of his companion.
document_data.Relationship: Durnan really appreciated the kickbacks that Maklin gave him.
document_data.Personality: Maklin was a distant and aloof individual. Many considered him quite odd but Durnan believed him an honest guy.
